title: Azure Functions Overview Page Exploration
vision: A modern Azure Functions overview page that surfaces function health, invocation trends, and recent failures at a glance — replacing the current flat list with a dashboard-style layout.
problem: Developers managing 20+ functions struggle to identify which ones need attention. The current list view requires clicking into each function individually.
successCriteria: Shows aggregated health status per function app · Displays invocation sparklines for the last 24h · Highlights functions with error rate > 5% · Supports filtering by runtime and status
nonGoals: Real-time log streaming · Deployment management · Code editing
constraints: Must use Coherence components · Desktop viewport only · No backend API calls
